title: morning_temperature_humidity_start_of_day
summary: First morning temperature and humidity measurement of the day.
description: Image records the first environmental reading of the day showing a temperature of 13.9Â°C and relative humidity of 71%. This measurement establishes the cold-start environmental baseline following a prior day with energy constraints and power-limited operations.

linked_references.note: Power constraint event marking the end of the previous operational day.

external_reference.note: Image verifies early morning environmental conditions.
